import React from 'react'; import API from '../api'; export default function Sidebar({ me, users, selected, onSelect, onLogout, alignRight, setAlignRight }){ return (
{me?.avatar ? : me?.name?.split(' ').map(s=>s[0]).slice(0,2).join('').toUpperCase()}
{me?.name}
{me?.email}
Chats
{users.filter(u => u._id !== me?._id).map(u => (
onSelect(u)}>
{u.avatar ? : u.name.split(' ').map(s=>s[0]).slice(0,2).join('').toUpperCase()}
{u.name}
{u.email}
))}
); }
